attributes.additional_details:
To appoint School Bullying Officers in every school, who are trained and  fully available to report bullying to, by word or mouth,privately if necessary,(by anyone who witnesses bullying) .
 To have the power to investigate and report offenders and if necessary segregate from other children in school breaks, dinners and assembly. To exclude repeat bullies from school trips and privileges etc. Also to council children on how to deal with bullying.
